name: Elden Ring
description: A vast dark-fantasy world filled with ancient ruins, powerful bosses, and legendary exploration crafted by FromSoftware.

name: Hollow Knight
description: Descend into a haunting underground world and uncover the mysteries of a fallen insect kingdom.

name: The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt
description: Play as Geralt of Rivia, a monster hunter searching for his lost daughter across a war-torn fantasy continent.

name: Cyberpunk 2077
description: Explore Night City as V, a mercenary outlaw chasing a one-of-a-kind implant that grants immortality.

name: Red Dead Redemption 2
description: Experience the decline of the Wild West through the eyes of outlaw Arthur Morgan and the Van der Linde gang.

name: Sekiro: Shadows Die Twice
description: Battle through Sengoku-era Japan as a skilled shinobi on a path of revenge and redemption.

name: Dark Souls III
description: Enter a decaying world filled with despair, brutal combat, and deep lore in FromSoftware’s acclaimed masterpiece.

name: God of War
description: Join Kratos and his son Atreus on a mythological journey through the harsh Norse realms.

name: Ghost of Tsushima
description: Become a samurai turned ghost and fight to reclaim your home from the Mongol invasion of Tsushima Island.

name: Assassin's Creed Mirage
description: Step into the streets of 9th-century Baghdad as Basim, a young thief seeking answers and purpose within the Hidden Ones.

name: Minecraft
description: Build, explore, and survive in an infinite world of blocks limited only by your imagination.

name: Terraria
description: Dig, fight, build, and explore in this 2D sandbox adventure filled with monsters and endless possibilities.

name: Celeste
description: Climb a mysterious mountain while overcoming your inner struggles in this emotional and challenging platformer.

name: Stardew Valley
description: Build the farm of your dreams, grow crops, raise animals, and form relationships in a peaceful rural town.

name: Baldur’s Gate 3
description: Forge your own destiny in a Dungeons & Dragons-based world filled with deep storytelling and meaningful choices.

name: DOOM Eternal
description: Rip and tear through Hell’s armies in this intense, high-speed, demon-slaying FPS experience.

name: Hades
description: Defy the god of the dead as Zagreus in a stylish, fast-paced roguelike set in the depths of the Underworld.

name: Death Stranding
description: Deliver hope across a fractured America as Sam Bridges, reconnecting humanity in a hauntingly beautiful world.

name: Resident Evil 4 Remake
description: Reimagined classic horror. Join Leon S. Kennedy on a dangerous mission to rescue the President’s daughter.

name: The Last of Us Part I
description: Survive a post-pandemic America as Joel and Ellie in a heartbreaking story of love, loss, and endurance.
